summary: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.
cast: Jeremy Irons|Bruce Payne|Justin Whalin|Marlon Wayans|Robert Miano|Tomas Havrlik|Thora Birch|Edward Jewesbury|Zoe McLellan|Lee Arenberg|Kristen Wilson|Martin Astles|Matthew O'Toole|David O'Kelly|Richard O'Brien|Kia Jam|Nicolas Rochette|David Mandis|Robert Henny|Stanislav Ondricek|Roman Hemala|Tom Baker|Andrew Blau|Marta Urbanová|Jirí Machácek|Dave Arneson
title: Dungeons & Dragons (Dragones y mazmorras)
